product_overview: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with Next.js 14, TypeScript, and Sanity CMS designed to showcase professional projects, publications, certifications, skills, and blog content. The portfolio prioritizes high performance, comprehensive accessibility, SEO optimization, and seamless content management for a polished and engaging user experience.
core_goals: Showcase professional work, publications, certifications, and skills in a visually appealing and organized manner.
Ensure a responsive design that adapts flawlessly across devices with mobile-first styling.
Deliver exceptional performance with optimized images, lazy loading, and efficient code splitting.
Provide rich content management via Sanity CMS enabling easy updates and content control.
Maintain high SEO standards with meta tags, structured data, sitemap, and robots.txt for enhanced discoverability.
Ensure full accessibility compliance with WCAG 2.1 AA guidelines including keyboard navigation and screen reader support.
Support dark/light theme switching respecting system preferences to enhance user experience.
Enable smooth and engaging UI interactions with Framer Motion animations.
Implement robust form handling with validation and secure API interactions.
Facilitate easy deployment and development via Docker and CI/CD pipelines.
key_features: Modern tech stack with Next.js 14, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS for scalable and maintainable codebase.
Integration with Sanity CMS for dynamic content management with portable text support.
Responsive UI components built with Radix UI and dark/light theme support with next-themes.
Performance optimizations including image optimization to WebP and AVIF, lazy loading, caching strategies, and code splitting.
SEO features such as dynamic meta tags, JSON-LD structured data, Open Graph tags, XML sitemap generation, and robots.txt configuration.
WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility compliance, keyboard navigability, sufficient color contrast, and screen reader support.

Content sections including Hero with dynamic role rotation, Projects with filtering and search, Publications, Professional Experience, Certifications, Skills with proficiency levels, Blog with syntax highlighting, and Contact form with email integration.
Technical enhancements using Framer Motion for animations, React Hook Form with Zod for form validation, syntax highlighting for code blocks, and GitHub Actions for automated CI/CD pipeline.
Docker containerization and health monitoring for reliable deployment and operations.
Security enhancements with security headers and input sanitization on contact submissions.
user_flow_summary: Visitor lands on Home page displaying hero section with dynamic roles and featured content highlights.
User navigates to Projects page to browse and filter through development projects.
User visits Publications page to view sorted academic and technical publications.
User explores Certifications and Experience pages to review professional credentials and work history.
Visitor reads technical articles in the Blog section with enhanced code syntax highlighting.
User accesses Contact page to send inquiries via a validated contact form integrated with backend email service.
Content managers use the Sanity Studio interface to add or update content including projects, publications, blog posts, and more.
System performs sitemap and robots.txt generation automatically to aid search engine indexing.
The theme switching responds to system preferences and user selection with persistent storage of choice.
validation_criteria: All API endpoints return correct data with appropriate filtering and sorting for projects, publications, skills, and blog posts.
Contact form validates input data, including consent, and securely posts form submissions to backend.
The website achieves Lighthouse scores of 90+ for Performance, and 100 for Accessibility, Best Practices, and SEO.
The site ensures full accessibility compliance with WCAG 2.1 AA standards verified by keyboard navigation and screen reader tests.
Responsive design works flawlessly across all common device screen sizes and orientations.
Dark and light theme switching operates correctly including system preference detection.
SEO metadata, structured data, sitemap, robots.txt, and Open Graph tags are correctly implemented and verified.
Animations and transitions run smoothly without performance degradation.
Docker container builds and runs successfully in both development and production modes.
CI/CD pipelines via GitHub Actions function with automated testing and deployment steps.
Security headers are set correctly and input sanitization is effective against invalid data.
Performance optimization techniques like image lazy loading and caching deliver fast load times across networks.
